Author: LowFox5
Text: Normally and luckily I even out and just stay around the same. Although my cheeks swell a bit so I feel puffier due to do it.   Sometimes if I feel I havent thrown up enough of whag I've eated I will restrict the next day as well though.

Author: TheThirdCloneOfXyxl
Text: I've been purging for a good few years on/off. I usually get super dehydrated and end up storing excess fluid because of it, so I gain weight but not fat. But regarding getting all the food up, it depends! If I'm eating TONS upon tons I normally maintain or gain even if I purge because purging only counteracts so much. But if I have an average binge and throw up, I normally still lose weight overall.
